entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
